story.text: A GUI programmer, web developer, Linux hack (not hacker, really), and burgeoning [[Evil Manager]]. Home page sitting unfinished at [http://www.willer.ca/steve/ www.willer.ca] . It seems like such a chore to update a web page when your job is all about the web... so it never gets done.
Anyway, interestingly, this is the first link you see if you search for "steve willer" on Google. So I'll put primary info here:

work email:
willer@klickit.com (I work at Klick Communications in Toronto, [http://www.klickit.com www.klickit.com])
